column2: Total No. of Persons under Arrest including those from Previous Year (Col.2)
column3: No. of Persons whose Cases Compounded or Withdrawn (Col.3)

column7: Percentage of Persons whose Trials Remained Pending { (Col.5 *100)/ (Col.2)} = (Col.7)
column8: Percentage of Persons Convicted to Trials Completed {(Col.6 * 100) / (Col.4)} = (Col.8)
